description: Single-storey, part two-storey rear extension; single-storey, part two-storey side extension; roof extension to side roof slope; roof extension to main rear roof slope incorporating a Juliet balcony; installation of one roof light to front roof slope and two roof lights to outrigger roof slope; alteration to front porch
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 19_061_S00 (location plan - existing), 19_061_S1 (existing plans), 19_061_S2 (existing plans), 19_061_S3 (existing elevations), 19_061_P0A (location/site plan), 19_061_P1A (proposed plans), 19_061_P2A (proposed plans) & 19_061_P3A (proposed elevations)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match those indicated in the approved plans.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing | All side facing windows shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7 metres from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies 7.4, 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), policies Local variation to policy 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
